A Bus In pin serves as input for a bus in a circuit.

The input format is selectable. Auto format will display values with eight or fewer digits as binary and larger values in hex. The control can also be specified to display hex, binary, or 16-bit float values. Values can be input with the prefixes 0xb and 0x for binary and hexadecimal.

The Narrow option displays the pin half as wide as normal. This function is only useful for narrow values such as small numbers of hex digits (usually two at the most).
